info.title: Project literal getter
info.description: This class is responsible for getting project literals from production. If translator is active, it will get literals from development.

method.name: get
method.description: Get a literal value. If translator is active or we are on development environment, the literal will be fetched from development.

parameter.name: $attributes
parameter.description: An array of attributes to pass to the literal.

parameter.name: $wrapped
parameter.description: Whether the literal will be wrapped inside a span.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to get the literals from. If NULL, get the current system locale. NULL by default.

method.returndescription: The literal span if wrap is requested or the literal value. It will return NULL if there is no literal with given name in the given scope.

method.name: wrap
method.description: Wrap the literal into a simple span.

method.name: getLiteral
method.description: Get a literal value from production library.

parameter.name: $attributes
parameter.description: An array of attributes to pass to the literal.

parameter.name: $wrapped
parameter.description: Whether the literal will be wrapped inside a span.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to get the literals from. If NULL, get the current system locale. NULL by default.

method.returndescription: The literal span if wrap is requested or the literal value. It will return NULL if there is no literal with given name in the given scope.

method.name: onDEV
method.description: Check whether we are on the Development Environment.
method.returndescription: True if we are on DEV, false otherwise.
